item.title: Chapter15 The InnoDB Storage Engine
item.description: 15.1 Introduction to InnoDB 15.1.2 Best Practices for InnoDB Tables 使用索引 关闭自动提交 (写速度限制) 15.1.3 Verifying that InnoDB is the Default Storage Engine DEFAULT 字样 1 2 SHOW ENGINES; SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.ENGINES; 15.2 InnoDB and the ACID Model A: atomicity. C: consistency. I: isolation. D: durability. 15.3 InnoDB Multi-Versioning InnoDB 在每行记录
